channel.title: CVE Feed for pillarjs -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for pillarjs -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-43799|2024-09-10T19:34:18.557Z -- pillarjs -- send
item.description: Send is a library for streaming files from the file system as a http response. Send passes untrusted user input to SendStream.redirect() which executes untrusted code. This issue is patched in send 0.19.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-45296|2024-09-09T19:38:12.783Z -- pillarjs -- path-to-regexp
item.description: path-to-regexp turns path strings into a regular expressions. In certain cases, path-to-regexp will output a regular expression that can be exploited to cause poor performance. Because JavaScript is single threaded and regex matching runs on the main thread, poor performance will block the event loop and lead to a DoS. The bad regular expression is generated any time you have two parameters within a single segment, separated by something that is not a period (.). For users of 0.1, upgrade to 0.1.10. All other users should upgrade to 8.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-43799|2024-09-10T14:45:06.761Z -- pillarjs -- send
item.description: Send is a library for streaming files from the file system as a http response. Send passes untrusted user input to SendStream.redirect() which executes untrusted code. This issue is patched in send 0.19.0.
